sen.j: 兄の大庭景親に与同して、石橋山の戦いでは平家方につき源頼朝の討伐に参加し、頼朝を敗走させた。
sen.e: Joining in with his older brother Kagechika OBA, Kgehisa participated in the Battle of Ishibashiyama to put down MINAMOTO no Yoritomo who was subsequently forced to retreat.
Joining in with his older brother Kagechika OBA, Kagehisa participated in the Battle of Ishibashiyama as a Heike (the Taira clan) force to subdue MINAMOTO no Yoritomo and put him to rout.

sen.j: その際に頼朝に寵愛されていた佐奈田義忠と死闘を繰り広げ、長尾定景（新六）の助けにより一命を取り留めた。
sen.e: On that occasion, Kagehisa was engaged in a life-and-death combat against Yoshitada SANADA who was a favorite of Yoritomo which Kagehisa survived with help of Sadakage (Shinroku) NAGAO.
